name: pgm-webshop
description: Webshop of the education programme "Associate Degree in Computer Programming"

scripts.build:all: npm run clean:build && npm run build:server && npm run copy:all
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:data && npm run copy:views && npm run copy:package && npm run copy:procfile
scripts.copy:package: copyfiles package-build.json build && move-file build/package-build.json build/package.json
scripts.serve:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production HOSTNAME=localhost PORT=8081 node build/app.js
scripts.serve:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development HOSTNAME=localhost PORT=8080 nodemon --exec babel-node -e js,html,nj src/app.js --watch src/*

author: Philippe De Pauw - Waterschoot
